data.input: Create a virtual machine called testVM in the eastus region with the UbuntuLTS image in resource group myResourceGroup
Stop the virtual machine named myVM in the westus region
Start the virtual machine called appServer in the centralus region within resource group devResources
Delete the virtual machine called oldVM from the eastus region within resource group archiveGroup
List all virtual machines in the resource group productionGroup
Create a new resource group named myNewResourceGroup in the westus region
Delete the resource group named oldResources from my Azure account
Show all resource groups in the eastus region
Create a virtual machine called dataVM in the westus2 region with the WindowsServer image in resource group devGroup
Start the virtual machine named prodVM in the southcentralus region within resource group productionGroup
